mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT E.*,ENT_NAME ,REP_NAME, REP_PHONE,ENT_LOGO,OPEN_CHECK, T.MEM_NO FROM RECRUITMENT E LEFT JOIN REVIEW S ON (S.ENT_NO = E.ENT_NO) LEFT JOIN INTERESTEDRECRUITMENT T ON(T.REC_NO = E.REC_NO) LEFT JOIN ENTERPRISE R ON (R.ENT_NO = E.ENT_NO) LEFT JOIN SUPPORT U ON (U.REC_NO = E.REC_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = U.MEM_NO) ORDER BY REC_STARTDATE ASC
